entry.title: Welcome to Alistair's GitHub Project Pages
entry.content:
This is a new site, so it's only got two pages - this one and the one where I scraped data from Google Scholar on Antigen Processing.

I'm not sure what else will be appearing here yet. It depends what I get up to.

My official (and rather out of date) University page is over at the Computational Modelling Group site.

This site was built using Hyde, a two-column Jekyll theme by @mdo
